title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 561.9 - Refunds and credits of prepaid tax-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 561.9 - Refunds and credits of prepaid tax-general

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to section
561.10
of this Part, a refund or credit of prepaid tax will be allowed under certain
circumstances to the party which has paid or had passed through to it such
prepaid tax. (b) A refund of
prepaid tax will be allowed only to the extent that the prepaid tax which has
been paid by or passed through to the claimant with respect to particular motor
fuel exceeds the liability for tax incurred by the claimant on the retail sale
or use of such motor fuel. (c) A
claim for a credit of prepaid tax may not exceed the amount of such tax
actually paid by or passed through to the claimant with respect to particular
motor fuel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
561.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
